name: CALAMITY CREATURES
description:
Abstract
CALAMITY CREATURES is a 2D action game in boss rush format, in which players dismantle giant mechanical creatures. In this game, mechanical creatures of overwhelming stature stand before you.
In order to overcome the desperate gap in strength, you will need to use gadgets in the prosthetic hands, the surrounding terrain, and sometimes even the habits of your enemies.... You will need to make effective use of everything.
Find their weaknesses points and dismantle the living calamity.

Mechanical Creatures
Hostile creatures have a wide variety of characteristics.
They range in size from large animals to skyscrapers, and their habits vary.
To defeat them, you must sometimes perform difficult actions and sometimes use your head.

Various Actions
The character can perform various actions with the gadgets in her prosthetic hand.
A variety of actions are possible, such as clinging to enemies, turning bolts, shooting bows, and ejecting wires.

Others
This game is compatible with game controllers.
